actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the beneficiary travel program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
short_title: Rural Veteran Access to Care Act

summary.text: Rural Veteran Access to Care Act - Provides for the reimbursement of the travel expenses a veteran with a service-connected disability incurs for the examination, treatment, or care for which the veteran is eligible. (Currently, that disability must be rated at 30% or more, unless the travel is in connection with the treatment or care of the disability or the veteran qualifies for such reimbursement on other grounds.)

titles.title: Rural Veteran Access to Care Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the beneficiary travel program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
